D

Dart - Class in logic
The Class Dart - contains specific methods to deal with the darts in the game.
Dart() - Constructor for class logic.Dart
Instantiates a new dart.
dart_dragon() - Method in class logic.Dragon
Darts the dragon, that is, places it on top of a Dart.
dart_hero() - Method in class logic.Hero
Increases the number of darts of the hero.
darts - Variable in class logic.Game
The darts.
dec_number_darts() - Method in class logic.Game
Decreases the number of darts.
dec_number_dragons() - Method in class logic.Game
Decreases the number of dragons.
Dragon - Class in logic
The Class Dragon - contains specific methods to deal with the dragons in the game.
Dragon() - Constructor for class logic.Dragon
Instantiates a new dragon.
dragon_turn() - Method in class logic.Game
Computes the dragons' turn.
dragon_type - Variable in class logic.Game
The type of dragons: 0 - not moving; 1 - moving; 2 - sleeping and moving.
dragons - Variable in class logic.Game
The dragons.
dragons_burn() - Method in class logic.Game
Determines a list of dragons that can burn the hero
dragons_close() - Method in class logic.Game
Determines the dragons close to the hero.
